body_html:
@axeltidemann Also fighting with this issue right now with. Generated the graph with tensorflow/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph.py and get the following error using my own Batch Norm layer that uses moving average. Running 0.9

Input tensor 'root/cond/root/moments/moments_1/mean/ExponentialMovingAverage:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type float32_ref

Anyone figure out a workaround?
body:
@axeltidemann Also fighting with this issue right now with. Generated the graph with tensorflow/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph.py and get the following error using my own Batch Norm layer that uses moving average. Running 0.9

```
Input tensor 'root/cond/root/moments/moments_1/mean/ExponentialMovingAverage:0' Cannot convert a tensor of type float32 to an input of type float32_ref
```

Anyone figure out a workaround?
